sentence.Network_en: The barbaric slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman.
sentence.Network_cn: 对鲸的野蛮屠杀既不必要也不人道。

sentence.Network_en: They will be concerned to cut back expenditure on unnecessary items.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将会考虑削减不必要的开销。

sentence.Network_en: The pity is that it was all completely unnecessary.
sentence.Network_cn: 遗憾的是这完全没有必要。

list.abs: 赘这字怎么读，有什么含义？_百度知道 ... 赘述[ tautology;say more than is needed] 赘言[ unnecessary talk] 赘疣[ wart].

entry.tran: 不需要的；没必要的；多余的
entry.def: If you describe something as unnecessary, you mean that it is not needed or does not have to be done, and is undesirable.

example.ex: The slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman...
example.tran: 屠杀鲸鱼是没有必要的也是不人道的。

example.ex: He accused Diana of making an unnecessary fuss.
example.tran: 他责备黛安娜没必要那么大惊小怪。

auth_sentence.content: The use of mythology and supernatural entities are unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: The use of mythology and supernatural entities are unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The use of mythology and supernatural entities are unnecessary.

auth_sentence.content: The Justice Department says such a rule is unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Justice Department says such a rule is unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Justice Department says such a rule is unnecessary.

auth_sentence.content: They took an extreme gamble, which was unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: They took an extreme gamble, which was unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They took an extreme gamble, which was unnecessary.

Sentence.sentence: Hotel owners found themselves with a huge number of empty rooms even as a lot of unnecessary new hotels were ready to open.
Her husband feels it's unnecessary for her to work since the family does not need the added income.
Automation makes it unnecessary to employ too many skilled workers.
Since much of this energy comes from the utilisation of fossil fuels, wastage of food potentially contributes to unnecessary global warming as well as inefficient resource utilisation.
It prompted employees to overcharge for work and to complete unnecessary repairs on a company wide basis.

sentences.en: There’s no sense in taking unnecessary risks.
sentences.cn: 做不必要的冒险毫无意义。

sentences.en: This renders it unnecessary for me to do anything.
sentences.cn: 这使我无需做任何事情。
